Title: The Climb
Writer: Ludovic Bernard (adaptation), Ludovic Bernard (screenplay), Nadir Dendoune (adaptation), Nadir Dendoune (novel), Nadir Dendoune (screenplay), Olivier Ducray (adaptation), Olivier Ducray (screenplay)
Actors: Ahmed Sylla, Alice Belaïdi, Kévin Razy, Nicolas Wanczycki
Plot: A young man from the suburbs with no mountaineering experience decides to climb Mt Everest to show a woman he'd do anything for her.
